title: Grimhilda! - a fantasy for children - and their parents
description: Toby's parents are always too busy to pay much attention to him. When they're kidnapped by Grimhilda, a woman posing as Toby's babysitter, Toby has to set out in the night to rescue his parents, accompanied by a rag doll called Polly, and a talking map. With fear, exhilaration, despair and bravery he eventually makes it to the place where the parents are being held; but the danger isn't yet over....
author: Mike Crowl
